long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unix time (also known as POSIX time or Epoch time) is a system for describing instants in time, defined as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 00:00:00 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), Thursday, 1 January 1970. This is a quick converter that let's you convert a specific date (and time) to the it's Epoch time representation.
